name: Flashpoint
description: Flashpoint delivers Business Risk Intelligence (BRI) that empowers organizations worldwide to combat threats and adversaries

options.name: Flashpoint API URL
options.description: The base URL of the Flashpoint API including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Result Limit
options.description: The maximum amount of results to be returned per query

options.name: Ignore List
options.description: Comma delimited List of domains and IPs that you never want to send to Flashpoint

options.name: Ignore Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Ignore IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up.
